snippet: The court’s action cleared the way for President François Hollande to sign the legislation into law.
abstract: High court in France rejects legal challenges to legislation that grants same-sex couples the right to marry and adopt children, clearing it for passage into law by Pres Francois Hollande.
lead_paragraph: The court’s action cleared the way for President François Hollande to sign the legislation into law.

headline.main: France’s Same-Sex Marriage Legislation Ruled Constitutional

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
